channel.title: Potential project
channel.description:
Was wondering if any java developers would be interested in working on a 2006 based remake private server. I have the funds to pay for the website, vps ect and other essential needs but unfortunately I am not a java developer. I will be providing community management while providing a bridge between players and the developers. I would be looking for one to two server developers and one client developer. All positions will be paid if requested (Will not be paying for mediocre work, if you prove to be a substantial programmer you will be well compensated.). If interested please shoot me a pm or post below.
Examples of things server developers will be expected to do. Fix all player reported bugs Add quests Minigames Bosses (Possibly custom content if requested by the community)

item.title: Potential project
item.dc:creator: @suseto21 suseto21
item.description:
@suseto21 wrote:

I am not particularly keen on joining another community, but as far as customs and custom content, my server is in need of eyes and ears to detect and determine any bugs in game before release, if interested pm me.

Read full topic
